hero.title: Emotional Health Plan
hero.subtitle: Presented by Rohit Singh
hero.alt: Serene mountain landscape at sunrise with misty valleys

objectives: Demonstrate understanding of emotional health pillars (physical, mental, social, lifestyle).
Implement and track at least three healthy habits over two weeks.
Reflect on outcomes using qualitative and quantitative evidence.

smartGoals.goal: Do moderate cardio for 30 minutes, 4 days per week for 3 weeks.
Complete 1 guided breathing session daily for 14 days.
Journal 5 days per week for 3 weeks.

riskSignals: Loss of interest in usual activities

crisisPlan.instructions: If you feel unsafe, contact a trusted adult and local emergency services immediately.

artifacts: Before/after self-rating of stress, mood, sleep

rubricMapping.ContentAccuracy: Objectives covered in each section with credible tips and examples.

physicalActivities.title: Physical Activities
physicalActivities.subtitle: Movement to regulate stress and mood
content: Regular physical activity boosts mood and reduces anxiety.
Target: 150–300 minutes of moderate activity weekly or 75–150 minutes vigorous.
Mix cardio, strength, and mind–body sessions for balance.

examples.title: Examples of Physical Activities
items: Aerobic: brisk walking, jogging, cycling, swimming
Strength: bodyweight circuits, resistance bands, weights
Mind–Body: yoga, tai chi, mobility flow

mentalStrategies.title: Mental Strategies
mentalStrategies.subtitle: Train attention, thoughts, and emotions
content: Mindfulness and meditation help reduce stress and reactivity.
Journaling clarifies thoughts and tracks patterns.
Set realistic goals and celebrate small wins.

items: Visualization of calm or success moments.

socialSupport.title: Social Support
socialSupport.subtitle: Connection as protective factor
content: Supportive relationships buffer stress and improve resilience.
Share feelings with trusted people to lighten emotional load.
Join interest groups to expand your network.

ways.title: Ways to Build Social Support
items: Schedule regular hangouts or calls with friends.
Volunteer to meet others and contribute positively.
Seek professional help when needed (e.g., school counselor).

healthyLifestyle.title: Healthy Lifestyle Choices
healthyLifestyle.subtitle: Daily inputs that shape wellbeing
content: Eat balanced meals with fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and proteins.
Aim for 7–9 hours of sleep to recharge body and mind.
Limit screen time and set digital boundaries.

tips.title: Tips for Healthy Living
items: Plan meals ahead and hydrate consistently.
Establish a bedtime routine and keep a consistent wake time.
Protect time for hobbies and recovery.

closing.reminder: Remember: Developing an emotional health plan takes time and commitment. Prioritize your emotional well-being and make small, consistent changes for a healthier, happier you.
